title: Remember When Tour de France Wild-Card Selection was a Surprise? Uno-X, TotalEnergies Return for 2024
content:
Analysis: Points and rankings dictate the Tour de France wild-card selection process that's now almost devoid of drama and intrigue.

Read the full article at Remember When Tour de France Wild-Card Selection was a Surprise? Uno-X, TotalEnergies Return for 2024 on Velo.
author: ahood
